system.description: Negative energy spreads in all directions, dealing 1d8 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +25) to each selected living creature. Like other inflict spells, mass inflict light wounds cures undead in its area instead of damaging them, and the undead receive no save.
system.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
